snippet: Turkish officials said that an aircraft believed to belong to the Syrian military crashed near the Turkey-Syria border Saturday, with the Syrian opposition claiming to Turkish media they were responsible for shooting the plane down....

headline.main: Congo Opposition Party Expels Top Official in Sign of Infighting
headline.print_headline: Congo Opposition Party Expels Top Official in Sign of Infighting

lead_paragraph: Turkish officials said that an aircraft believed to belong to the Syrian military crashed near the Turkey-Syria border Saturday, with the Syrian opposition claiming to Turkish media they were responsible for shooting the plane down.
